59127.「さて デルクロアの捕獲任務に向かうか。\n 言っておくが 殺してはならんぞ。\:
It's time to go nab Delcroix. Remember boys,
we're to bring him back alive. Of course,
we can always rough him up a bit first...

59129.「キサマ！ 偵察兵の報告にあった\n デルクロアの仲間だな！？:
Well, look who we have here. Aren't you
Delcroix' lackey? The scouts told us all
about you!

59130.「ちょうどいい！ アストルティアのサルが\n どれほどのものか 試してくれよう！:
Perfect timing! How's about you show us what
Astoltian beasts are really capable of?!

59131.「せっかく命拾いしたものを わざわざ\n 殺されに戻るとは アストルティアのサル:
Coming back for more after getting away by
the skin of your teeth... You Astoltian
beasts are as dumb as you look.

59132.「いいだろう！ そこまで死にたいのなら\n キサマの望みどおりに してやるわ！:
Fine! If you want to die that badly, I'll give
you what you want!

61988.「ガハッ……。我らが 敗れるとは\n キサマ ただのサルではないな……。:
Argh... you're not just a run of the mill
beast, are you...?

61989.「クククク……。だが 残念だったな。: Keh heh heh...well, too bad for you.

61990.「この世界に来た 本隊は 我らだけではない。\n ……そう。隊長ゴルゴンザ殿が:
You see, we're not the only ones who came to
this world. Our Captain Gorgonza should
already be on his way to your boss...

61991.「ああっ！ <pc>さん！\n 大変なことが 起きたでンス！\n こっちに来るで:
There you are, <pc>！Thomething awful hath
happened! Get your drawerth over here!

61992.「うううう……。ご主人さまが\n ゴルゴンザに さらわれてしまったでンス……。:
It'th the mathter... that Captain Gorgontha
took him away and there wath nothing I could
do...

61993.「この身を 盾としてでも\n ご主人さまを 助けたかったでンスが\n ボクは ワ:
I wanted to help, even if it meant turning
mythelf into a thield, but I can't fight
back anymore...

61994.「ただのタンスのフリをして やり過ごすしか\n なかったでンスよ。情けないでンス:
I had to pretend I wath juth a thimple
Wardrobe and hide in the corner here. I'm
thimply pathetic.

61995.「そんなことより ご主人さまの手によって\n 強化薬が量産されたら 地上制圧隊が:
They're gonna forthe Mathter to math-produthe
thothe enhanthement potionth, all tho the
Ground Patrol can launch an invathion!

61996.「でも 奴らが 魔界に戻るまでに\n ご主人さまを助け出せれば\n まだ 希望は:
But there'th thill hope. We juth have to
rethcue him before he'th taken back to the
Demon World...

61997.「……<pc>さん。今回の お礼でンス。\n これから <pc>さんが強くなるの:
<pc>. Take thith ath a token of my thankth
for your help. Uthe it to get thronger.

61998.「そして ご主人さまを助けるために \n 準備ができたら また どうぐ使いになっ:
And when you're ready to help rethcue
Mathter, come back here ath an Item Mathter.

62000.「うううう……。ご主人さまの手によって\n 強化薬が量産されたら 地上制圧隊が\:
Uuuuuu... if they forthe Mathter to make that
potion, the Ground Patrol will invade thith
world.

62001.「でも まだ 希望は あるでンスよ。\n 奴らが 魔界に戻るには 時間があるでン:
But there is still hope. There is still time
for them to return to Demon World.

62002.「<pc>さん。しばらく修行して\n もっと強い どうぐ使いになってから\n ま:
<pc>. After you have trained for a
while and become a stronger item master, you
will come back here again.

62004.「うううう……。ご主人さまの手によって\n 強化薬が量産されたら 地上制圧隊が\:
Uhhhh... If the master mass-produces the
potion, the ground troops may invade this
world.

62005.「でも まだ 希望は あるでンスよ。\n 奴らが 魔界に戻るには 時間があるでン:
But there is still hope. There is still time
for them to return to Demon World.

62006.「<pc>さん。今のうちに修行して\n 準備ができたら また どうぐ使いになって:
<pc>. When you're ready, you'll come
back here as an item master.
